mbedTLS
-------
This software uses the mbedTLS library.
mbedTLS is used under the Apache License, Version 2.0.

libcurl
-------
This software uses the libcurl library.
libcurl is used under a MIT/X derivate license.

OpenCV
------
This software uses the OpenCV library.
OpenCV is used under a 3-clause BSD license.

MNN
---
This software uses the MNN library.
MNN is used under the Apache License, Version 2.0.
